languages.text: "Я... не верю, что отец может быть причастен к этому. Он часто резок и груб, но заговор против Вольного Торговца — это немыслимо. Это расходится со всем, чему он учил меня с самого рождения. Не могу представить и даже допустить мысль о том, что он... изменил самому себе".

traits.locale_text: "Я... не верю, что отец может быть причастен к этому. Он часто резок и груб, но заговор против Вольного Торговца — это немыслимо. Это расходится со всем, чему он учил меня с самого рождения. Не могу представить и даже допустить мысль о том, что его мнение о чести изменилось".
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

languages.text: 「私には…父がこんな陰謀に関わっているなんて思えません。父は辛辣で無礼な人ですが、自由開拓者への反逆を企てるはずがありません。私が生まれてからずっと受けてきた教えに、何もかもが反しています。父が…こんなふうに己の信念を裏切ることなど、想像もできないのです」
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: 「私には…父がこんな陰謀に関わっているなんて思えません。父は辛辣で無礼な人ですが、自由開拓者への反逆を企てるはずがありません。私が生まれてからずっと受けてきた教えに、何もかもが反しています。父が…こんなふうに己の信念を裏切ることなど、想像もできないのです」
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: “我认为……我的父亲与本次事件应该是无关的。虽然他有时很严厉、很粗鲁，但他绝不可能密谋反抗行商浪人。这违背了他从小到大对我的教导。我完全无法想象……他不可能会以这样的方式，背叛自己一直以来的信念。”
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: “我认为……我的父亲与本次事件应该是无关的。虽然他有时很严厉、很粗鲁，但他绝不可能密谋反抗行商浪人。这违背了他从小到大对我的教导。我完全无法想象……他不可能会背叛自己一直以来的信念。”
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: « Je... ne crois pas que mon père soit impliqué dans cette affaire. Il est dur, oui, et souvent malpoli, mais jamais il ne participerait à un complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Non, ce serait contraire à tout ce qu'il m'a inculqué depuis ma naissance. Je ne peux même pas imaginer la possibilité qu'il... se soit trahi lui-même de cette manière. »
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: « Je... ne crois pas que mon père soit impliqué dans cette affaire. Il est dur, oui, et souvent malpoli, mais jamais il ne participerait à un complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Non, ce serait contraire à tout ce qu'il m'a inculqué depuis ma naissance. Je ne peux même pas imaginer la possibilité qu'il... se soit trahi lui-même. »
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: «Yo... no me puedo creer que mi padre esté involucrado en esto. Podrá ser duro y grosero, pero conspirar contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente es otra cosa. Va en contra de todo lo que me ha enseñado desde que nací. No puedo ni siquiera imaginarme la posibilidad de que... se haya traicionado a sí mismo de esta forma».
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... no me puedo creer que mi padre esté involucrado en esto. Podrá ser duro y grosero, pero conspirar contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente es otra cosa. Va en contra de todo lo que me ha enseñado desde que nací. No puedo ni siquiera imaginarme la posibilidad de que... se haya traicionado a sí mismo».
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Ich ... kann nicht glauben, dass mein Vater in die Sache verwickelt ist. Er kann oft harsch und grob sein, doch eine Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ist undenkbar. Das widerspricht allem, was er mich seit meiner Geburt gelehrt hat. Ich kann mir nicht einmal die entfernte Möglichkeit vorstellen, dass er ... sich selbst auf diese Weise verraten hat."
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... kann nicht glauben, dass mein Vater in die Sache verwickelt ist. Er kann oft harsch und grob sein, doch eine Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ist undenkbar. Das widerspricht allem, was er mich seit meiner Geburt gelehrt hat. Ich kann mir nicht einmal die entfernte Möglichkeit vorstellen, dass er ... sich selbst verraten hat."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Şey... Babamın bu işle bir ilgisi olduğuna inanmıyorum. Bazen kaba saba olabiliyor, evet. Fakat Hür Tacir'e başkaldırması düşünülemez bile. Doğduğumdan beri bana öğrettiği her şeyle çelişir bu. Bunun ihtimalini dahi hayal edemiyorum... Kendisine böyle ihanet etmiş olamaz."
languages.original_text: "I... don't believe my father can be involved in this. He can often be harsh and rude, but a conspiracy against the Rogue Trader is unthinkable. This goes against everything he has taught me ever since I was born. I cannot even imagine the possibility that he... has betrayed himself in such a way."

traits.locale_text: "Şey... Babamın bu işle bir ilgisi olduğuna inanmıyorum. Bazen kaba saba olabiliyor, evet. Fakat Hür Tacir'e başkaldırması düşünülemez bile. Doğduğumdan bu yana bana öğrettiği her şeyle çelişir bu. Bunun ihtimalini dahi hayal edemiyorum... Kendine böyle ihanet etmiş olamaz."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
